item.title: Purplefox Analysis
item.description: Originally written Thu, Jun 15, 2023 A couple of months ago, I came across an intriguing .tmp file that was sent to me. The sender mentioned that their antivirus software had flagged and caught the file on their computer. Naturally, I decided to investigate further. Although the file was labeled as a .tmp file, running it through a file utility revealed that it was actually an MSI (Microsoft Software Installer) file.
